Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th near Lawndale/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near Lawndale/31st.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, 31st and Lawndale.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park and 25th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Harlem (Blue Line O'Hare Branch) Station
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Harlem (Blue Line O'Hare Branch) due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Harlem (Blue Line O'Hare Branch) due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Sheridan
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Sheridan due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Sheridan due to fire department activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
